body:
Comment 2: 
Agreed that the parser probably should exit early if there are "too many" errors. At the
very least, it should exit early if the source doesn't look like a text file at all.

In fact the current implementation does exit early if there are errors parsing the
package clause, but for binary files even getting past that clause causes a lot of
errors (invalid encoding of the source). The following CL fixes this problem:

http://golang.org/cl/6458115

Leaving this issue open for now.
